Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: Araya
Message:
CRITICAL FIX: Thai SARA AA removal + font selector sync

Bug #1: Sanitizer removing SARA AA (เธฒ, U+0E32)
- Root cause: removeOrphanThaiMarks() incorrectly classified SARA AA as combining mark
- SARA AA (U+0E32) is NOT in combining ranges (U+0E31-0x0E3A, U+0E47-0E4E)
- Fixed: Updated logic to treat SARA AA as standalone vowel (isBase=true)
- Impact: Items #4, #6, #16, #18, #19 now preserve Thai vowels

Bug #2: Font selector not seeing registered fonts
- Root cause: AVAILABLE_FONTS Set was hardcoded, never updated dynamically
- Korean/CJK fonts registered but selector fallback to Thai
- Fixed: Added updateAvailableFonts() sync mechanism
- Impact: Korean/CJK text now uses correct fonts

Files modified:
- pdfTextSanitizer.v6.unified.ts (lines 290-320)
- pdfFontSelector.ts (lines 16-30)
- pdfFontsMultilingual.ts (lines 125-147)

Ref: User report Oct 20, 2025

Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: Araya
Message:
CRITICAL FIX: Thai SARA AA removal + font selector sync

Bug #1: Sanitizer removing SARA AA (เธฒ, U+0E32)
- Root cause: removeOrphanThaiMarks() incorrectly classified SARA AA as combining mark
- SARA AA (U+0E32) is NOT in combining ranges (U+0E31-0x0E3A, U+0E47-0E4E)
- Fixed: Updated logic to treat SARA AA as standalone vowel (isBase=true)
- Impact: Items #4, #6, #16, #18, #19 now preserve Thai vowels

Bug #2: Font selector not seeing registered fonts
- Root cause: AVAILABLE_FONTS Set was hardcoded, never updated dynamically
- Korean/CJK fonts registered but selector fallback to Thai
- Fixed: Added updateAvailableFonts() sync mechanism
- Impact: Korean/CJK text now uses correct fonts

Files modified:
- pdfTextSanitizer.v6.unified.ts (lines 290-320)
- pdfFontSelector.ts (lines 16-30)
- pdfFontsMultilingual.ts (lines 125-147)

Ref: User report Oct 20, 2025

Description: Discovered a potential authorization token provided in a curl command header, which could compromise the curl accessed resource.
Author: Araya
Message:
PDF rendering fix: Phase 2 Quick Wins complete

- Add SHA-256 font integrity verification (fontResolver.core.ts)
- Increase lineHeight 1.4โ’1.65 for Thai diacritics (pdfStyles.ts)
- Increase padding 1pxโ’3px for combining marks (pdfStyles.ts)
- Add font availability validation with fallback (pdfFontSelector.ts)
- Force NotoSansSymbols registration (pdfFontsMultilingual.ts)

Expected impact: 70-80% of reported issues resolved

Description: Discovered a potential authorization token provided in a curl command header, which could compromise the curl accessed resource.
Match:
curl http://localhost:3000/api/weekly/diagnostics | jq .

# Production (requires authentication)
curl https://your-domain.com/api/weekly/diagnostics \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer REDACTED"
Author: Araya
Message: 1.3 Youtube Complete ,Implement Plan-B Security Model
